title: 13 Beautiful Quotes To Make You Fall In Love With All Things October
text:
The sun setting immediately post 6pm; that winter smell in the air; the cool breeze that means summer's gone - all these things are beautiful reminders that our favourite autumn season is here.

Al these things mean that the most beautiful month of the year, October, is finally here. And in order to celebrate the month we eagerly waited for the entire year, here are some lines that'll make you fall in love with all things October.

description: Can you feel the sun setting immediately post 6 ? Can you smell comparatively fresh air? Can you feel the breeze that says, winter is coming? The above feelings arrive with the coming of the most beautiful month of the year, October, we eagerly wait for.
